section.heading: Post-removal disposition of certain vehicles without further notice.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of this section, see § 6 of Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-171, October 6, 2003, 50 DCR 9163).
This section is referenced in § 50-2201.03 and § 50-2421.07.
